pro: Professionally, I develop web sites and web applications using industry grade technologies and practices. My skill set span: from front-end design and implementations to back-end development. I enjoy each aspect, and love building sites & mobile web apps from start to finish, for clients all over the world. I'm available for remote work - if you would like to build something together,
I am forever passionate and innovative about learning new technology and expanding my knowledge.
body.edu: Originally trained as a Marine Biotechnologist at University of Asmara, later on switched career to follow my passion technology and the world of programming.
persona: I'm married and a proud father, I enjoy listening to jazz music while programming.
body.reason: It's the love and passion that I have for Art and creativity. When on my creative zone I sketch, paint and play keyboard among other things.

about.current: Full Stack Web Developer living close to London

home.body: Run's like this... born and lived in Eritrea untill the age of 30, where I acheived Diploma in Marine Microbiology and carried on later to get BSc. Marine Biotechnology. I love to travel and enjoy admiring beauty in nature particularly gazing at mesmerising sun raise and set.
